column5: For the past couple of weeks, the staff at the Dorion Ontario fish hatchery have been checking the Lake Trout for the condition of the eggs. Well today, some of them were ready and some egg collecting took place. The staff there are very accomodating and didn't mind at all that I took a video. The fish are netted from the holding tanks and then put in an anesthetic solution that immidiately calms them. They think that the Brook Trout might be ready next week. I'm hoping that I can see some of that. Here's what I got today.
heh heh, he's stroking the fish.
Dan to they get a cigarette to smoke after that ?  Good luck at getting to view the brookies
Dan to they get a cigarette to smoke after that ?  Good luck at getting to view the brookies lol thats funny
